name: CAMediaTiming
desc: Methods that model a hierarchical timing system, allowing objects to map time between their parent and local time.

items.name: var beginTime: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: Specifies the begin time of the receiver in relation to its parent object, if applicable.

items.name: var timeOffset: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: Specifies an additional time offset in active local time.

items.name: var repeatCount: Float
items.desc: Determines the number of times the animation will repeat.

items.name: var repeatDuration: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: Determines how many seconds the animation will repeat for.

items.name: var duration: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: Specifies the basic duration of the animation, in seconds.

items.name: var speed: Float
items.desc: Specifies how time is mapped to receiver’s time space from the parent time space.

items.name: var autoreverses: Bool
items.desc: Determines if the receiver plays in the reverse upon completion.

items.name: var fillMode: CAMediaTimingFillMode
items.desc: Determines if the receiver’s presentation is frozen or removed once its active duration has completed.
